ValidationRule.description: Contracted capacities should be set when the system is contracted, and not changed after that. We can change the Forecasted capacities via a SSSO to show the latest.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND( ISCHANGED( Client_Mngd_Contracted_Anchor_Capacity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Client_Mngd_Contracted_Anchor_Capacity__c)))), AND( ISCHANGED( Client_Mngd_Contracted_Small_CS_Capacity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Client_Mngd_Contracted_Small_CS_Capacity__c)))), AND( ISCHANGED( Client_Mngd_Contracted_Resi_Capacity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Client_Mngd_Contracted_Resi_Capacity__c)))), AND( ISCHANGED( Client_Mngd_Contracted_C_I_Capacity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Client_Mngd_Contracted_C_I_Capacity__c)))), AND( ISCHANGED( Client_Mngd_Contracted_LMI_Capacity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Client_Mngd_Contracted_LMI_Capacity__c)))), AND( ISCHANGED( Perch_Mngd_Contracted_Anchor_Capacity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Perch_Mngd_Contracted_Anchor_Capacity__c)))), AND( ISCHANGED( Perch_Mngd_Contracted_Small_CS_Capacity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Perch_Mngd_Contracted_Small_CS_Capacity__c)))), AND( ISCHANGED( Perch_Mngd_Contracted_Resi_Capacity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Perch_Mngd_Contracted_Resi_Capacity__c)))), AND( ISCHANGED( Perch_Mngd_Contracted_C_I_Capacity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Perch_Mngd_Contracted_C_I_Capacity__c)))), AND( ISCHANGED( Perch_Mngd_Contracted_LMI_Capacity__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Perch_Mngd_Contracted_LMI_Capacity__c)))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once set, Contracted capacities should not be changed
